summary: Blackjack is a popular card game played in casinos worldwide. It's a simple game where players try to get cards totaling closer to 21 than the dealer, without going over. The game uses one or more standard decks of 52 cards. Blackjack has many variations, including European and Russian versions, but the basic rules remain the same. It's a game of skill and strategy, where players must decide when to hit or stand to beat the dealer's hand.
title: Blackjack
